titleStmt.title: Miscellany poems and translations by Oxford hands.
titleStmt.author: Willis, Francis, b. 1663 or 4.

notesStmt.note: Francis Willis, Fellow of New College, Oxford, is the largest contributor. Cf. Case, English poetical miscellanies, 178.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
